title: ubuntu 18.04: issue with wxPython build
body:
**Your Operating system and DeepLabCut version**
 Ubuntu 18.04.1 LTS, with an Anaconda3 Env, & DeepLabCut2.x  ,GTX1050 Mobile
Install tensorflow-gpu by using 'conda install tensorflow-gpu'

**Describe the problem**
When I try to import deeplabcut in ipython, it fails and I get the error message below. It seems that there are some problems with wxPyhton? And Ubuntu 16.04 LTS is not work well in my computer. Should I return to Ubuntu 16.04LTS?
```
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
ImportError                               Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-2-52d2df9c7fa5> in <module>()
----> 1 import deeplabcut

/home/houiin/anaconda3/envs/deeplabcut-py36/lib/python3.6/site-packages/deeplabcut/__init__.py in <module>()
     23 else:
     24     mpl.use('TkAgg')
---> 25     from deeplabcut import generate_training_dataset
     26     from deeplabcut import refine_training_dataset
     27 

/home/houiin/anaconda3/envs/deeplabcut-py36/lib/python3.6/site-packages/deeplabcut/generate_training_dataset/__init__.py in <module>()
     13     pass
     14 else:
---> 15     from deeplabcut.generate_training_dataset.auxfun_drag_label import *
     16     from deeplabcut.generate_training_dataset.frameselectiontools import *
     17     from deeplabcut.generate_training_dataset.labeling_toolbox import *

/home/houiin/anaconda3/envs/deeplabcut-py36/lib/python3.6/site-packages/deeplabcut/generate_training_dataset/auxfun_drag_label.py in <module>()
     16 
     17 import numpy as np
---> 18 import wx
     19 
     20 

/home/houiin/anaconda3/envs/deeplabcut-py36/lib/python3.6/site-packages/wx/__init__.py in <module>()
     15 # Import all items from the core wxPython module so they appear in the wx
     16 # package namespace.
---> 17 from wx.core import *
     18 
     19 

/home/houiin/anaconda3/envs/deeplabcut-py36/lib/python3.6/site-packages/wx/core.py in <module>()
     10 """
     11 
---> 12 from ._core import *
     13 
     14 #-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=

ImportError: libpng12.so.0: cannot open shared object file: No such file or directory
```
**How to Reproduce the problem**
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Run ipython
2. import deeplabcut


**Screenshots**
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/30932544/50696984-e4f82400-107b-11e9-9849-765a6b018735.png)

**Additional context**
Where can I get libpng12.so? And where should I put it?
Thank you!!!
